Title: The OPAL Operating System Project
Body: Date: Thu, 21 Nov 1996 20:32:01 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.2 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Wed, 15 Nov 1995 23:21:19 GMT Content-length: 2596 The OPAL Operating System Project Opal The Opal project is exploring a new operating system structure, tuned to the needs of complex applications, such as CAD/CAM, where a number of cooperating programs manipulate a large shared persistent database of objects.
